title: List of time travel works of fiction
table_of_contents: 1 Time travel in novels, short stories and on the stage

paragraphs.text: Time travel is a common plot element in fiction. Works where it plays a prominent role are listed below. For stories of time travel in antiquity, see the history of the time travel concept. For video games and interactive media featuring time travel, see list of games containing time travel.

This list describes novels and short stories in which time travel is central to the plot or the premise of the work. Works created prior to the 18th century are listed in Time travel ยง History of the time travel concept.

paragraphs.title: Time travel in films
paragraphs.text: Time travel is a common theme and plot device in science fiction films. The list below covers films for which time travel is central to the plot or premise of the work.

paragraphs.title: Time travel in television series
paragraphs.text: Time travel is a recurrent theme in science fiction television programs. The list below covers television series for which time travel is central to the premise and direction of the plot and setting.
